title: How does the Chaos and Order Border work?
body: The Border and Icon cost 280 tokens (Most expensive option) but I'm confused on how it works. If you don't have the skin, is the border rendered useless? It's kind of a weird way of spending your tokens. Can someone enlighten me? Thanks!

replies.body: That border will in fact only work with the Nightbringer and Dawnbringer skins. Same as the Conqueror Karma border, in order to have the border you will need both the icon(border) and skin unlocked.

This is disappointing on different levels. If i over looked something that explained that, all on me... but if not, did you all not to think to mention it?

I spent RP to get a few tokens cause I know I would be busy for most of the month and used them to get the border. Never saw that it would only work with a select few skins.

Same here, Spent RP to get some tokens, had exactly 280 left and figured i might as well get that sweet border... Pretty disappointed now that its not working. First time i spent actual money on the game and probably the last. That was just very discouraging.
Would have been nice to know this before wasting 280 tokens on it..... Thanks.

Yeah I also wasted 280 tokens on it because I wanted to pair it with my judgement Kayle skin. I spent over 10 hours grinding those tokens. Thank you riot. Maybe next time you could put that very important tidbit in the item description (where it belongs!).
this is acutally pathetic. no where does it state this..... the heck you guys doing over there?
And the sad part is, I highly doubt they have any intentions to make amends over this matter.
